long_description: Transporting stuff by bike? The Blackburn EX-1 bike rack delivers sturdy support for up to 40 lbs. (18.1 kg) of gear, groceries or commuting wares, all at a great value. 9mm gauge aluminum construction ensures long-lasting performance; 3-strut design offers excellent load support and stability. Blackburn EX-1 bike rack is designed to work with either 26 in. or 700c frames and tires. Please note: panniers sold separately.
short_description: Transporting stuff by bike? The Blackburn EX-1 bike rack delivers sturdy support for up to 40 lbs. (18.1 kg) of gear, groceries or commuting wares, all at a great value.
